create table public."PetImage" (
  "PetImageID" bigint generated by default as identity not null,
  "PetID" bigint not null,
  "ImageID" bigint not null,
  constraint PetImage_pkey primary key ("PetImageID"),
  constraint PetImage_PetImageID_key unique ("PetImageID"),
  constraint PetImage_ImageID_fkey foreign KEY ("ImageID") references "Image" ("ImageID"),
  constraint PetImage_PetID_fkey foreign KEY ("PetID") references "Pet" ("PetID")
) TABLESPACE pg_default;
